- Updated API endpoints to align with latest specifications.  
- Removed deprecated methods and added replacements.

## ğŸ§ª **Test Plan**
Explain how you verified your changes.

**Example:**

- [ ] Unit tests executed and passing.  
- [ ] Verified functionality via Postman or Swagger.  
- [ ] Confirmed successful deployment in test/staging environment.

## âœ… **Quick Review Checklist**
Use this checklist to ensure completeness before requesting review:

- [ ] Code compiles without errors  
- [ ] Unit tests pass locally  
- [ ] New or modified tests added  
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)  
- [ ] PR title includes related ticket number  
- [ ] Peer review requested
